channel.title: FizzBuzz on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in FizzBuzz on Memo Tut

item.title: 5 patterns to challenge Fizz Buzz! problems with Python (only numbers up to 398 now)
item.description: I personally addressed the issue of Fizz Buzz! in [Python-only Mokumokukai](https://tsfcm.connpass.com/event/171853/), so here is the result report! Challenge the #Fizz Buzz issue A number from 1 to 398, If it is divisible by 3, display “Fizz!” If it is divisible by 5, display “Buzz!” If it is divisible by 3 and 5, display “Fizz Buzz!” In cases other than the above, the number is displayed as it is. Tip: Combining for and if statements
